channel.title: Chicago on Police Overhead
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago on Police Overhead

item.title: Chicago Fire - March 2021
item.description: In March 2021, Chicago Fire flew 2 aircraft for a total of 12 hours. There were 21 flights. The longest was 1.70 hours

item.title: Chicago Fire - February 2021
item.description: In February 2021, Chicago Fire flew 2 aircraft for a total of 3 hours. There were 6 flights. The longest was 1.21 hours

item.title: Chicago Fire - January 2021
item.description: In January 2021, Chicago Fire flew 2 aircraft for a total of 12 hours. There were 18 flights. The longest was 1.59 hours

item.title: Chicago Police - October 2020
item.description: In October 2020, Chicago Police flew 2 aircraft for a total of 74 hours. There were 56 flights. The longest was 3.36 hours
